TopicTitle: I'm running out of video ideas for KSP Cinematics/Films.... Got any suggestions?

Articles.Content:
Hello there fellow KSP players!

As you can tell by the title, my creativity isn't at an all time high, so I thought I would ask you people for some help of coming up with ideas for cinematics/ films I could make, maybe some one has some old script/stories or just ideas you came up with months ago? Feel free to message me!

Have great day!
